content.raw:
starting a new comment thread as the other thread is pretty deep

in 3be56fa, I added some discussion of a joint's fixed to parent and mobilized with child frames. I said that these frames are coincident with the joint frame in the initial configuration of the model but that the spec is ambiguous about which link the joint frame is attached to

I'm not sure where the discussion of the universal joint should go
